column1:
share on x sp sue (arnold) putnam. jun 21 at 2:01 pm may our heavenly father keep you safe within his loving arms as you mourn the loss of jim (husband, father, grandfather). may god give you the strength and the courage to get through these days and nights. and in time, may treasured memories and the abiding love of our savior bring you comfort and peace. one thing i know for sure is he loved his family! comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 22. 2:00 pm - 3:00 pm arab heritage memorial chapel1340 north main street. arab, al, us, 35016. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. service. jun 22. 3:00 pm arab heritage memorial chapel1340 north main street. arab, al, us, 35016. get missed the service? send flowers or gifts to the family's home. no medias to show. arab heritage memorial chapel website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store
